data.title: More Than 400 State-Licensed Cannabis Businesses Operating On California’s First Day of Legal Commercial Cannabis Activity
data.excerpt: SACRAMENTO – Temporary licenses issued by the Bureau of Cannabis Control for retailers, distributors, microbusinesses, testing laboratories, and event organizers are now in effect and businesses can begin operating in California’s newly-legal commercial cannabis market.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control

og_meta.site_description: Learn about California cannabis laws and licenses
